message: memes are my friends

I'm sorry you had to deal with stupid security officers and store owners... ; however, maybe that Asian salon owner wasn't being racist but rather did not have the education to cut coarser hair and was knowledgeable enough to know where her skills lacked ability. I've had terrible haircuts because the stylist didn't have the knowledge to cut my funky asian hair and didn't inform me of that. Unfortunately not all salon schools or hair stylists learn to cut all types of hair. If she was being racist I'm sorry. Personally i wouldn't want to support her business because either she's racist or needs more training.

Lol not my 7 year old...or my 8 year old. I teach my children and grandchildren to listen, research and think about not just themselves but what us in everyone's best interest. I want my kids to be happy and thoughtful. I am Christian. My youngest son believes in a higher power. He don't agree with me on a lot of things but that is OK. I respect his views. Not everyone will agree with my thinking. I respect that.. We all have a different journey in life we make different decisions based on our beliefs.... God bless

alternative facts galore...

Trump accusations, ill informed people, 13 yr. old give abandon address and phone number court throws out of court, ill informed people, Trump pays off mortgage for family after father kills himself, Harlem hoops program for inner city children founder killed in 9/11 Trump give $10,000 to keep program going, ill informed people (there are many more) Trump hires thousands many women (also African American woman in top position), ill informed people. I could go on and on, but why not research yourself and pick up some knowledge for yourself, and stop being ill informed. Have a good day, and stop attacking people who haven't taking the word of tv ads.
To God be the glory! Praise Him!

The media was ordered off the area. But with that said, everything they said made it look like it was the Patriots that were firing with rifles, when all the shooting was the FBI snipers and cops. It is heartbreaking how low our country has become. How people are not rallying around this to stop the injustices. As to the other folks, sharpton etc of course they will not be there. #1. Those folks are white. #2. They are Obama henchmen and this is an order from Obama to create this situation. He needs the conflict/civil unrest to declare Marshall law. The race baiting is not working because we, the whites, used words not force to fight back. His time in office is getting shorter and he needs to push harder to progress his agenda.
